pages.text: $(br2)Hold shift over edibles & drinks to see the nutrient values each item provides.$(br2)If you fall $(l)below 12$() you get a $(l)debuff$() for this nutrient.$(br)Same if you reach $(l)102 or above$() you'll ge a $(l)buff$() for this nutrient.$(br2)Potions currently dont work, they will only show the values but won't affect you currently.
